meanings.definition: The quality or state of being paranormal.
meanings.sent1: The paranormality of the ghost sighting intrigued the researchers.
meanings.sent2: Many people are fascinated by the paranormality of supernatural phenomena.
meanings.sent3: The paranormality of the situation made everyone laugh nervously.
meanings.sent4: His stories were filled with a sense of paranormality that kept listeners on edge.
meanings.sent5: The eerie paranormality of the abandoned house sent shivers down their spines.

meanings.sent1: She experienced a paranormality when the lights flickered inexplicably.
meanings.sent2: The town had a history of paranormality, with many reported sightings.
meanings.sent3: The paranormality of the UFO sighting left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: The sudden drop in temperature was a paranormality that couldn't be explained.
meanings.sent5: The paranormality of the mysterious figure in the mirror left her speechless.
